How can I share my ideas on the Verus forum?
You can share your ideas and join the discussion on the Verus Discord, not a forum. The correct platform to do so is Verus.io/discord.
Join the discussion & share your ideas on Verus.io/discord
Is there a way to submit a bug report on the Verus website?
No, there is no way to submit a bug report on the Verus website. Instead, you can join the discussion and share your ideas on the Verus Discord, which can be accessed at Verus.io/discord.
Join the discussion & share your ideas on Verus.io/discord
